title: Fragments, "The deities of Olympus", ca. 1805
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave
Plate break line visible just under cartouche with goddess driving a chariot pulled by lions.
dimensions:
A. Warp: 68cm (26 3/4in.). Weft: 68cm (26 3/4in.). B. Warp: 77-5cm (30 1/2in.). Weft: 34.5cm (13 1/2in.). C. Warp: 75cm (29 1/2in.). Weft: 19in. (7 1/2in.). All edges cut.
Pattern: Height of repeat: 51cm (20in.).                                            Designed for lengths to form a straight repeat when sewn together.
description: Circular and oval cartouches containing goddesses and decorative ornament on a background of scalloped lines. In brown on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, "The deities of Olympus", ca. 1805.
ca. 1805. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave
Plate break line visible just under cartouche with goddess driving a chariot pulled by lions.. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-63-a/c.
